page.title: 15PLUCKLEY GHOSTS 4
page.content: Little is known about{THE MONK}whose spirit haunts the house which was at one time his home except that he enjoyed a friendly relationship with a lady who lived nearby at Rose Court. Accompanied by her pet dogs, she would often visit him at the house. Their two ghosts walk the lanes together with the shadows of her dogs close behind. {THE TUDOR LADY}of Rose Court kept two dogs and at times her house echoes to her voice calling them. Her visits occur usually between 4 and 5 o'clock in the afternoon, when she took her own life by drinking poison made from ivy berries. She was last seen looking towards Greystones, the home of the monk, with whom she was friends.
